mapper.insert: INSERT INTO comment (content, post_date, member_id, notice_id) VALUES (#{content}, #{postDate}, #{memberId}, #{noticeId})
mapper.select: SELECT c.id, c.content, c.post_date, m.username, c.member_id, c.notice_id FROM comment c LEFT JOIN Member m ON c.member_id = m.id WHERE c.notice_id = #{noticeId}
